channel.title: Compiler Issues
channel.description: I'm using the compiler correctly and it gives no errors. I'm using The Revolution source but whenever I log in it doesnt save anything. Like when i wanted to change some text it doesn't save. But it is saved in client. I'm using Vista and there wasn't a client notepad file in the folder so I had to use a backup and edit that If that helps any. Thanks

item.description:

that or another compiler…

item.title: Compiler Issues
item.dc:creator: @i_scary_i i scary i
item.description:
@i_scary_i wrote:

you gotta have the correct files , if some are missing it obviously wont work. Make sure your compiler has the correct path by right clicking it and hitting edit. Change the path if its not correct. Also make sure your coding it correctly. But if your not getting errors you’re coding it correctly… so hmm… not sure. Try using a different source?Or a new compiler?

Read full topic

@Cozmo131 wrote:

I’m using the compiler correctly and it gives no errors. I’m using The Revolution source but whenever I log in it doesnt save anything. Like when i wanted to change some text it doesn’t save. But it is saved in client. I’m using Vista and there wasn’t a client notepad file in the folder so I had to use a backup and edit that If that helps any. Thanks
